content: मित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [मि मा-वा-क्त] {@--1@} Measured, meted or measured out. {@--2@} Measured off, bounded, defined. {@--3@} Limited, measured, moderate, little, scanty, sparing, brief (words &c.); पृष्टः सत्यं मितं ब्रूते स भृत्योर्हो महीभुजां <ls>Pt. 1. 87</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 34.</ls> {@--4@} Measuring, of the measure of; (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>), as in ग्रहवसुकरिचंद्रमिते वर्षे {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} in 1889. {@--5@} Investigated, examined. {@--6@} Cast, thrown away. {@--7@} Built. {@--8@} Established, founded.
